author: Kaelan Deese
title: Lululemon apologizes, fires art director for 'Bat Fried Rice' shirt
description: The athletic-wear company Lululemon has issued an apology after its art director shared a post of a "bat fried rice" shirt design that was criticized as being racist....
content:
The athletic-wear company Lululemon has issued an apology after its art director shared a post of a "bat fried rice" shirt design that was criticized as being racist.
Trevor Fleming, the senior global art director of Lululemon, shared a link on Sunday via In… [+2128 chars]
